Description: Foot and wall sherd of Attic black-glazed pottery fish-plate; moulded ring foot with groove on resting surface; shallow central depression on floor with scraped groove at its edge; central nipple on underside; wholly glazed save for stand-ring; inscription cut on underside.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 557)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1884)
